timeline.bodyText:
We actually should remove all importers before and including the current importer.
Say you have a Maven and Eclipse project in your directory:
1st pass:

gradle, doesn't apply
Maven, applies, is removed
Eclipse, not checked

2nd pass:

Gradle, retested, still doesn't apply
Eclipse applies, is removed

3rd pass:

Gradle retested, still doesn't apply
